name: The Moorings

reviews.title: Top Notch B&B
reviews.text: I have stayed at The Moorings frequently over the years and would recommend it wholeheartedly; it provides a great ambience with welcoming and informative hosts, breakfast and accommodation to a consistently high standard, all contributing to a great break in Rothesay.
Aileen M
reviews.title: Great Place

reviews.text: This was our 3rd stay and wont be our last. Frank and Barbara are lovely friendly people who are there when needed. The accommodation is great and has everything to ensure a comfortable stay. Breakfast was perfect and plentiful, I think if my husband would have kept eating then the food would have kept coming!! Thanks again for providing such a great service
reviews.title: Supberb B&B!

reviews.text: Carolyn
reviews.title: Excellent B&B

reviews.text: I have just returned from a super weekend at this wonderful B&B. Although I have stayed there many times it never fails to amaze me how Frank and Barbara manage to maintain their high standards in this economic climate. Every guest is welcomed as though they are part of the family. The bedrooms with en-suites are large, airy, bright and clean. There are coffee/tea making facilities, TV and hairdryers. The views are to die for and...... the breakfast is fantastic! Always freshly prepared as per requests. Will I return? Of course I will. Why would I go anywhere else when everything I need or require on a visit to Rothesay is provided at the 'The Moorings'
reviews.title: Excellent B&B booked in to stay again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First of all the views from our bedroom/lounge window were just AMAZING and it was worth staying in the Moorings for that alone. We had a very large room complete with the added comfort of a lounge area. The room was spotless and really very relaxing it was difficult dragging my husband out to see the island! what with the views and the Open on the TV. Breakfast was served in the lovely dining room - also with first class views. Delicious breakfast with fruit cereals yogurts etc etc etc and full English with endless coffee/tea.Barbara and Frank the owners were just so helpful and nothing was too much trouble. This is a lovely old Victorian home full of character and after passing the other B& B's on the way so glad that we stayed here.
reviews.title: A relaxing retreat

reviews.text: Frank and Barbara were friendly, helpful and informative about Bute and all that happens in the local community. We went for a walking weekend and they went 'the extra mile' to help us, providing lifts etc and informing of the best walking routes and places to eat. Our rooms were clean and very comfortable - a real home from home. Great rooms and excellent breakfasts.
reviews.title: What a B&B should be

reviews.text: We loved this B&B.
reviews.title: An Oasis

reviews.text: The two young men who are the owners (away) sons looked after us. They were both charming and made us feel so welcome and even carried all our luggage (and we had A LOT) up to the delightful rooms with terrific views.
reviews.title: Lovely place

reviews.text: As both Jenny and my husband were sailng in the Fife Regatta, when the men got in they were soaking wet, tired and in urgent need of TLC. They had great showers and when feeling human again joined us for drinks in my room as all the rooms have a great lounge.
reviews.title: Buteiful!!

reviews.text: Hotel's location is close to the ferry and the city center.
reviews.title: An unpleasant experience
Great B&B, will stay again
reviews.text: I got a spacious family room just for my self.
Although the room was quiet and the bed was comfortable, i couldn't wait to leave this place: the room was very dirty when i checked in and it wasn't cleaned once during my stay!
reviews.title: Excellent B&B
A great start to our visit to Scotland
reviews.text: The breakfast is just ok, but i wasn't asked for my preferences and just served a plate with different types of food. The sea view from the dining room is very beautiful, though.
In addition, the tv didn't work, which is not convenient in a small place with little night life.
reviews.title: Great B&B in a great location, great breakfast

reviews.text: Visited for one night with our 2 young children. Family room clean and nice to have sofa to sit on too. Breakfast tasty and a good selection. Proprietors very helpful, pleasant and welcoming. Very accommodating to children, offering them breakfast options and talking to them. Very nice place and great value too.
reviews.title: Very nice, pleasant people and great service

reviews.text: Absolutely Fantastic wee bed and breakfast and a real find in Rothesay. Rooms are spotless, big, bright and airy and generally comfortable. Views from the front are truly lovely and location is excellent for the town. Frank and his wife make you feel very welcome and a very knowledgable about the island. Breakfast selection is amazing from yogurts, fruit, cereals etc and then a full Scottish!!! Excellent value for money and would always return here when visiting Rothesay.
reviews.title: A Real Find

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The owners of this B&B are very experienced and know the island very well. We were made very welcome very quickly, with Frank giving us a map and a little talk about some of the things we could do while we were there.
reviews.title: Lovely B&B on the seafront
Very understanding
reviews.text: Frank's knowledge definitely came in handy because not everywhere is open seven days a week; he told us where to eat our first night (a Monday - we stayed for three nights), 'because it's the best place to eat and not open Tuesdays and Wednesdays'. We have no doubt we would have missed a superb meal (The Waterfront Bistro, for those who want a good meal!) if we hadn't taken his advice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you like the modern boutique type of place then this probably isn't your cup of tea; however, if you like the traditional type of B&B with friendly people then this is very likely to be a perfect place for you to stay.
reviews.title: Excellent B&B
